title: Sly Cooper Status Check - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.16.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/games now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

Get 10% off all Logitech G products with promo code KFGAMES at http://logitechg.com.

Mat Kraemer from Sanzaru Games cohosts with Greg and talks Asgard's Wrath, working with PlayStation, and what's up with Sly Cooper.

00:07:18 - Housekeeping
KINDA FUNNY DAY 2020 is Jan 3rd! All Day stream! Are you ready for Kinda Funny Games 4.0?
Next week’s schedule is nuts for the holiday: PSVR Show, KFP, Mandalorian -- stay tuned for the exact schedule.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:09:15 - Head of Strategy, Worldwide Studios
00:14:15 - Wattam Reviews!
00:23:21 - Apple Arcade’s $50 Annual Subscription, Steve Watts @ GameSpot
00:27:15 - Out today
00:30:44 -  THIRDLOVE
00:32:13 -  UPSTART
00:33:20 -  LOGITECH
 Reader mail   -
00:35:22 - Can you please talk about the shift from 3rd person games like Sly, Spyro, Sonic, and God of War, to VR first person? - The Nano Biologist
00:46:24 - While we are still so far away from the Xbox series x coming out do you think memeing the new Xbox will help their marketing out or hurt them? - Frank furtter
00:48:02 - “Has DLC ever changed your mind on a game, good or bad?” - The Nano Biologist
00:51:56 - Squad Up: Play Asgard's Wrath!
00:52:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Imran and Fran
